translation: The great elements, egoism, intellect, and also the Unmanifested Nature, the ten senses, and one mind, and the five objects of the senses.
commentary: 13.6 Mahabhutani the great elements? Ego: egoism? Intelligence: intellect? Avyaktam the unmanifested (MulaPrakriti)? Eve even? f and? The senses the senses? Ten ten? One one? f and? Five five? f and? Indriyagocharaá¸¥ objects of the senses.Commentary The field and its modifications are described in this verse. The twentyfour principles of the Sankhya school of philosophy are mentioned here.Great elements
